channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Is Google’s Apology for Censorship Sincere?
item.description: ‘The government made us do it’ should not suffice to avoid accountability, nor should it instantly restore the public trust so blatantly betrayed.

item.title: The High Costs of Forever QE
item.description: It amplifies the temptation to overspend in turbulent times.

item.title: Raddatz Shows Concern For Fat Generals But Not GOP Assassination Targets: All The Questions From ABC’s This Week
item.description: First, Raddatz minimizes Hegseth’s expertise, then then she suggests he is a lightweight compared to the people he was addressing.

item.title: Spanberger, Hashmi Refuse To Pull Support For Dem AG Candidate Who Mused About Killing Republican, Death Of His Kids
item.description: Neither Spanberger nor Hashmi disavowed their support for Jones' AG bid when pressed by The Federalist.

item.title: Jim Banks Demands Census Bureau Fix Errors That Gave Dems 6 Extra Seats
item.description: 'It is crucial the Census Bureau take steps to ensure that the 2030 Census does not allocate political power to illegal aliens,' Banks said.

item.title: Jack Ciattarelli for New Jersey Governor
item.description: The Garden State has gotten unified Democratic governance good and hard over the last decade. It deserves something better.
